description: A kayak trip, a light hike or a beach volleyball game – anything goes with these comfortable shorts in cool, quick-drying stretch fabric. The waist has all-around elastic and there’s an inside drawstring for a secure fit. Zippered hand pockets take care of small items. Being light and packable, they are perfect for travelling and outdoor life in warm climates.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Relaxed Shorts - Mens
